channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Both sets of temporary lights out of order, 13th September
item.description:
This is very dangerous! All the barriers have been knocked down by emergency police vehicles. Big buses are coming down and people are getting trapped for ages
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 188, Charlton Road, Charlton, London

item.title: Overhanging branches, 13th September
item.description:

item.title: Zip line broken, 13th September
item.description:
Zip line has been out of action for a long time This is the most popular item in the playground and keeps kids of many ages occupied for a long time, while teaching waiting and sharing. Please fix.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malyons Road, Ladywell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal HMO, 13th September
item.description:
111 Wickham street is operating an illegal HMO. The owner of the property has rented out several rooms in his house. These people are noisy and violent. They have parties until the early hours of the morning and shout abuse at me and my family. There are upwards of 6 people living in that house. This has been going on for the last couple of years and the situation is getting worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beal Close, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
